reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Strategies for diffusion and consolidation of inclusive school at national level

description.narrative: L'iniziativa agisce per il rafforzamento strategico del modello di scuola inclusiva a tempo pieno a supporto del Ministero dell'Educazione per standardizzare il modello e rafforzare la sua applicazione a livello nazionale

The project aims at improving the results of the Full Time Inclusive School through the standardization of the model and the coordination of its implementation at national level by strengthening the public education system.

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, eliminate gender disparities in education and ensure equal access to all levels of education and vocational training for the vulnerable, including persons with disabilities, indigenous peoples and children in vulnerable situations
Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
